dcterms:creator: G. Hua
M. Brown
S. Winder
dcterms:description: The Multi-view Stereo Correspondence (MSC) dataset consists of pairs of matching and non-matching patches extracted from images of the Statue of Liberty, Notredame, and Half Dome (Yosemite). It includes more than 1.5M grayscale patches, with matching pairs representing the same 3D structure and non-matching pairs representing different 3D points.
dcterms:title: Multi-view Stereo Correspondence (MSC) dataset
